alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 25 at 7:42PM CST until December 26 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM CST /2 AM MST/ TO 9 PM CST /8 PM MST/ SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 40 to 60 mph with gusts up to 75 mph expected. * WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains. * WHEN...From 3 AM CST /2 AM MST/ to 9 PM CST /8 PM MST/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Severe turbulence near the mountains will be hazardous for low flying light aircraft. Strong winds can cause hazardous conditions for trailers and high profile vehicles and blowing dust that can reduce visibility suddenly.

area.areaDesc: Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains
